introduce_product: Set against a backdrop of matte black and white, these new Baby-G timepieces really show their strength.  A new 3D protection structure wraps larger than normal cases with segmented LCD windows for easy viewing.  Auto-Dual Illuminator EL Backlights illuminate both the LCD and perimeter of the dial plate for maximum visibility in the dark and 200M water resistance shuts out the elements. Matte black resin band with black face.
